text:
Jasper doesn't reload classes. This is fixed JasperLoader but it doesn't work 
because org.apache.catalina.core.StandardLoader doesn't let refresh ClassLoader 
this because in method setClassLoader() context is flagged ReadOnly.

if (servletContext instanceof ApplicationContext)
((ApplicationContext) servletContext).setAttributeReadOnly
(Globals.CLASS_LOADER_ATTR)

Another thing, because classloading is done in JasperLoader. There is need to 
touch or edit jsp to get refreshed classes working. this is kind of anonoying
creator: illuusio@mailcity.com

text:
I really don't understand your explanation.
I had forgotten to change JspServler. The class loader attribute is 100% 
useless now (I have a patch to remove all the affected code in StandardLoader), 
so any problem you had with the attribute should be solved.
